alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Heavy rain showers with embedded thunder will impact portions of northern Cattaraugus and southeastern Erie Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Collins, or 12 miles south of Hamburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boston, Eden, Springville, Gowanda, Arcade, North Collins, East Concord, Ashford Hollow, Chaffee, Concord, Collins, Yorkshire, Sardinia, Delevan, East Otto, Perrysburg, Lime Lake-Machias, Langford, Versailles and West Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
